message.content:
I need to identify the difference between revenue and cost in this income statement.

Looking at the statement:
- Total Revenue: 3397619.40
- Total Cost: 1337000.00

The difference between revenue and cost is represented by the line item "Gross Profit" which equals 2060619.40.

This matches what I'd calculate manually: 3397619.40 - 1337000.00 = 2060619.40

Therefore, the value of the difference between revenue and cost is 2060619.40.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2060619.40'}}
```
